card.name: Snake Attack
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "double breaker" until the End Step ■ Choose one of your shields and put it into your graveyard.

card.name: Galek, the Shadow Warrior
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker." Then your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Time Tripper, Shadow of Stagnation
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent's puts a card into their mana zone, tap it.

card.name: Flame Lance Trap
card.text: ■ Strike Back ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5000 or less.

card.name: Triple Mouth, Decaying Savage
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

card.name: Kodamanma, All-Devouring Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Kodamanma, Gil Gil Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Vice Kaiser Zeta, the Vengeance
card.text: ■ For each spell in your opponent's graveyard, this creature costs 1 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent reveals their hand and discards all spells from it. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Zabi Barrel, Western Doll
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger

card.name: Geo Nasuo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard.

card.name: Entertainer of Stealing and Lying
card.text: ■ If you have other creatures in the battle zone, this creature can't be attacked. ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone without paying its cost, destroy that creature.

card.name: Honenbe, Skeletal Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Devil Hand
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ You may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Arima and Kicker, Quiche Ban Ban
card.text: ■ Mana Reburst

card.name: Shibakage Hitoshi
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Mana Arms 5: At the start of your turn, if you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone and this creature is in your graveyard, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, put this creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Dark Masters, Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard up to 3 cards from it.

card.name: Iron Fist of Revolution
card.text: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger—Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell For No Cost ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck and choose a fire creature from among them. Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has the same as or less power than that creature. ■ After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

card.name: Myscu, Mirage
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then that player shuffles their deck and reveals the top card. If it's a creature, that player may put it in the battle zone For No Cost

card.name: Romanov the 2nd, Demonic Eye Hierophant
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. From among them, you may cast a spell that costs 6 or less For No Cost

card.name: Dark Life
card.text: ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone, and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: The Lost, Dark Armor
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is in your graveyard, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, put this creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Mega Magma Dragon
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have 5000 power or less.

card.name: Kodamadance Charger
card.text: ■ Return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. ■ Charger

card.name: Kizamu, Forbidden V
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.

card.name: Reload Charger
card.text: ■ You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. ■ Charger

card.name: Burgmaru-Kun
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. ■ When this creature is destroyed, draw a card.

card.name: Bell Hell De Skull, Moon Reaper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a card from your mana zone or graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Hexpain, Invincible Reaper
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add one to your hand, put one into your graveyard, and put one into your mana zone.

card.name: Linnevenus, M Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ Slayer ■ Double Breaker ■ Mana Arms

card.name: Nurgle, Forbidden X
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks and isn't blocked, destroy this creature. Then destroy the attacking creature.

card.name: Colorful Nasuo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then put 4 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard.

card.name: Domanmodrange
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ During your turn, you may summon a creature from your mana zone. ■ Whenever you put another creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses and discards a card. ■ Fushigiverse

card.name: Oniyose's Jutsu
card.text: ■ Choose one of your shields and add it to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger". ■ This turn, the next darkness or fire creature you summon may cost up to 4 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less.
